titleStmt.title: An elegie and epitapth [sic], upon the Right Honourable the Lord Francis Villars: written by an affectionate servant to his family, kinsman to his person, and prisoner for the same caus this noble lord so bravely dyed in.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "What are the crying sins of this our State,".
Woodcut mememto mori at head of verse.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
